title: Pharma Medical Cannabis More Robust and Resilient
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Exploring more about the medical/pharma side of cannabis sector and thematic ETF investing. Rahul Bhushan is co-founder of Rize ETF and joins Rena Sherbill to discuss when passive makes more sense than active management, low fees and transparency. Europe's funds and cannabis market vs US and Canada, preferring CBD to THC, R&D of other cannabinoids, ancillary players and the 3 waves of the cannabis industry. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
